definition: Madras or Chennai 欽奈|钦奈[Qin1 nai4], capital of Tamil Nadu on East coast of India
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: The court case is scheduled for 29 January in Madras.
sentences.chinese: 這起案件將於1月29日在印度馬德拉斯開庭審理。

sentences.english: Madras Packaging currently employs 79 in Argos.
sentences.chinese: 馬德拉斯包裝目前有員工79阿哥斯。

sentences.english: He ordered a lamb madras to take away.
sentences.chinese: 他點了一份外賣的馬德拉斯羔羊肉。
